definition: to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
to snort disdainfully/to scoff at/to turn up one's nose
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
to pay no attention to/not to mind
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to have the nerve/what a cheek!/to feel no shame/to overcome the shame/(is it) proper? (rhetorical question)
